title: Media law
creator_credit: Bennet Berkov, Annenberg and CPB Project
brief_description: Focuses on reporters’ rights and defemses for potential libel or invasion of privacy lawsuits as well as concepts like open meeting, shield and freedom of information laws. Discusses legal issues that may confront students working for a school newspaper or other publication.
